createFromJobCard.description: Create invoice directly from job card

createFromJobCardMinimal.description: Minimal payload - only job card required

quotation.description: Quotation number (e.g., 'QT-001'). If provided, invoice will be created from quotation data.

jobCard.description: Job card number (e.g., 'JC-001'). Required if quotation is not provided.

labourAmount.description: Labour charges amount. Defaults to 0 if not provided.

partsAmount.description: Parts charges amount. Defaults to 0 if not provided.

vatPercentage.description: VAT percentage. Defaults to 0 if not provided.

status.description: Invoice status. Options: 'Unpaid', 'Partially Paid', 'Paid'. Defaults to 'Unpaid'.

notes: If 'quotation' is provided, invoice data will be taken from quotation
If 'jobCard' is provided, you can override amounts manually
Grand total is auto-calculated: (labourAmount + partsAmount) + VAT
Invoice number is auto-generated (INV-001, INV-002, etc.)
